get.description: List the operations for the provider

post.description: VirtualMachinesCancelOperations: Cancel a previously submitted (start/deallocate/hibernate) request
VirtualMachinesExecuteCreate: Execute create operation for a batch of virtual machines, this operation is triggered as soon as Computeschedule receives it.
VirtualMachinesExecuteDeallocate: Execute deallocate operation for a batch of virtual machines, this operation is triggered as soon as Computeschedule receives it.
VirtualMachinesExecuteDelete: Execute delete operation for a batch of virtual machines, this operation is triggered as soon as Computeschedule receives it.
VirtualMachinesExecuteHibernate: Execute hibernate operation for a batch of virtual machines, this operation is triggered as soon as Computeschedule receives it.
VirtualMachinesExecuteStart: Execute start operation for a batch of virtual machines, this operation is triggered as soon as Computeschedule receives it.
VirtualMachinesGetOperationErrors: Get error details on operation errors (like transient errors encountered, additional logs) if they exist.
VirtualMachinesGetOperationStatus: Polling endpoint to read status of operations performed on virtual machines
VirtualMachinesSubmitDeallocate: Schedule deallocate operation for a batch of virtual machines at datetime in future.
VirtualMachinesSubmitHibernate: Schedule hibernate operation for a batch of virtual machines at datetime in future.
VirtualMachinesSubmitStart: Schedule start operation for a batch of virtual machines at datetime in future.

Azure.Core.azureLocation.description: Represents an Azure geography region where supported resource providers live.

CancelOperationsRequest.description: This is the request to cancel running operations in scheduled actions using the operation ids

operationIds.description: The list of operation ids to cancel operations on

CancelOperationsResponse.description: This is the response from a cancel operations request

results.description: An array of resource operations that were successfully cancelled

CreateResourceOperationResponse.description: The response from a create request

description.description: The description of the operation response

type.description: The type of resources used in the create request eg virtual machines

location.description: The location of the start request eg westus

results.description: The results from the start request if no errors exist

DeadlineType.description: The types of deadlines supported by ScheduledActions

values.name: InitiateAt
values.description: Initiate the operation at the given deadline.

values.name: CompleteBy
values.description: Complete the operation by the given deadline.

DeallocateResourceOperationResponse.description: The response from a deallocate request

description.description: The description of the operation response

type.description: The type of resources used in the deallocate request eg virtual machines

location.description: The location of the deallocate request eg westus

results.description: The results from the deallocate request if no errors exist

DeleteResourceOperationResponse.description: The response from a delete request

description.description: The description of the operation response

type.description: The type of resources used in the delete request eg virtual machines

location.description: The location of the start request eg westus

results.description: The results from the start request if no errors exist

ExecuteCreateRequest.description: The ExecuteCreateRequest request for create operations

executionParameters.description: The execution parameters for the request

ExecuteDeallocateRequest.description: The ExecuteDeallocateRequest request for executeDeallocate operations

executionParameters.description: The execution parameters for the request

ExecuteDeleteRequest.description: The ExecuteDeleteRequest for delete VM operation

executionParameters.description: The execution parameters for the request

ExecuteHibernateRequest.description: The ExecuteHibernateRequest request for executeHibernate operations

executionParameters.description: The execution parameters for the request

ExecuteStartRequest.description: The ExecuteStartRequest request for executeStart operations

executionParameters.description: The execution parameters for the request

ExecutionParameters.description: Extra details needed to run the user's request

optimizationPreference.description: Details that could optimize the user's request

retryPolicy.description: Retry policy the user can pass

GetOperationErrorsRequest.description: This is the request to get errors per vm operations

operationIds.description: The list of operation ids to query errors of

GetOperationErrorsResponse.description: This is the response from a get operations errors request

results.description: An array of operationids and their corresponding errors if any

GetOperationStatusRequest.description: This is the request to get operation status using operationids

operationIds.description: The list of operation ids to get the status of

GetOperationStatusResponse.description: This is the response from a get operations status request

results.description: An array of resource operations based on their operation ids

HibernateResourceOperationResponse.description: The response from a Hibernate request

description.description: The description of the operation response

type.description: The type of resources used in the Hibernate request eg virtual machines

location.description: The location of the Hibernate request eg westus

results.description: The results from the Hibernate request if no errors exist

OperationErrorDetails.description: This defines a list of operation errors associated with a unique operationId

errorCode.description: The error code of the operation

errorDetails.description: The error details of the operation

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the error occurence

timeStamp.description: The timestamp of the error occurence

azureOperationName.description: The compute operationid of the Start/Deallocate/Hibernate request

crpOperationId.description: The compute operationid of the Start/Deallocate/Hibernate request

OperationErrorsResult.description: This is the first level of operation errors from the request when clients get errors per vm operation

operationId.description: The operationId identifying a vm operation

creationTime.description: The creation time of the error result

activationTime.description: The activation time of a vm operation

completedAt.description: The completion time of the operation if the operation was completed

operationErrors.description: A list of errors associated with the operationid

OperationState.description: Values that define the states of operations in Scheduled Actions

values.name: Unknown
values.description: The default value for the operation state enum

values.name: PendingExecution
values.description: Operations that are waiting to be executed

values.name: Executing
values.description: Operations that are in the process of being executed

values.name: Cancelled
values.description: Operations that have been Cancelled by the user

OptimizationPreference.description: The preferences customers can select to optimize their requests to ScheduledActions

values.name: Availability
values.description: Optimize while considering availability of resources

values.name: CostAvailabilityBalanced
values.description: Optimize while considering a balance of cost and availability

ResourceOperation.description: High level response from an operation on a resource

resourceId.description: Unique identifier for the resource involved in the operation, eg ArmId

errorCode.description: Resource level error code if it exists

errorDetails.description: Resource level error details if they exist

operation.description: Details of the operation performed on a resource

ResourceOperationDetails.description: The details of a response from an operation on a resource

operationId.description: Operation identifier for the unique operation

resourceId.description: Unique identifier for the resource involved in the operation, eg ArmId

opType.description: Type of operation performed on the resources

values.name: Unknown
values.description: The default value for this enum type

subscriptionId.description: Subscription id attached to the request

deadlineType.description: Type of deadline of the operation

values.name: InitiateAt
values.description: Initiate the operation at the given deadline.

values.name: CompleteBy
values.description: Complete the operation by the given deadline.

values.name: Unknown
values.description: The default value for the operation state enum

values.name: PendingExecution
values.description: Operations that are waiting to be executed

values.name: Executing
values.description: Operations that are in the process of being executed

values.name: Cancelled
values.description: Operations that have been Cancelled by the user

resourceOperationError.description: Operation level errors if they exist

completedAt.description: Time the operation was complete if errors are null

retryPolicy.description: Retry policy the user can pass

ResourceOperationError.description: These describe errors that occur at the resource level

ResourceOperationType.description: The kind of operation types that can be performed on resources using ScheduledActions

values.name: Unknown
values.description: The default value for this enum type

baseProfile.description: JSON object that contains VM properties that are common across all VMs in this batch (if you want to create 100 VMs in this request, and they all have same vmSize, then include vmSize in baseProfile)

resourceOverrides.description: JSON array, that contains VM properties that should to be overridden for each VM in the batch (if you want to create 100 VMs, they all need a distinct computerName property, you pass computerNames for each VM in batch in this array), service will merge baseProfile with VM specific overrides and create a merged VMProfile.

resourceCount.description: Number of VMs to be created

resourcePrefix.description: if resourceOverrides doesn't contain "name", service will create name based of prefix and ResourceCount e.g. resourceprefix-0,resourceprefix-1..

Resources.description: The resources needed for the user request

ids.description: The resource ids used for the request

items.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

RetryPolicy.description: The retry policy for the user request

retryWindowInMinutes.description: Retry window in minutes for user request

Schedule.description: The schedule details for the user request

deadlineType.description: The deadlinetype of the operation, this can either be InitiateAt or CompleteBy

values.name: InitiateAt
values.description: Initiate the operation at the given deadline.

values.name: CompleteBy
values.description: Complete the operation by the given deadline.

StartResourceOperationResponse.description: The response from a start request

description.description: The description of the operation response

type.description: The type of resources used in the start request eg virtual machines

location.description: The location of the start request eg westus

results.description: The results from the start request if no errors exist

executionParameters.description: The execution parameters for the request

SubmitHibernateRequest.description: This is the request for hibernate

executionParameters.description: The execution parameters for the request

SubmitStartRequest.description: This is the request for start

executionParameters.description: The execution parameters for the request
